data.title: What These 8 'Austin Powers' Cast Members Have Done Since Their Roles In The Films

data.text:
Publish date: 2024-06-06

The Austin Powers films are now observed as 3 classic comedy films. Of route, everybody has an opinion about which movie is best. It was the brainchild of Mike Meyers, who set out to spoof spy films, particularly James Bond. Meyers played a number of characters in the films and each and every installment incorporated an especially talented cast.

The sequence spawned 3 films: 1997's Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery, 1999's Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me, and 2002's Austin Powers in Goldmember. With this kind of talented cast, one would be curious as to what they have got done since their roles in the series ended.

Let's find out.

8 Mike Myers

Meyers played many characters in the Austin Powers series, together with the title persona. His initial burst of popularity and success came when he joined the cast of Saturday Night Live. His time on the show ended in the movie collection Wayne's World. Meyers starred in the film Shrek as the name character alongside Eddie Murphy and Cameron Diaz. The film franchise continued till 2010. Meyers additionally had supporting roles in the 2018 films Terminal and Bohemian Rhapsody. He also directed the 2013 documentary Supermensch: The Legend of Shep Gordon.

Related: The Real Reason Beyonce's Austin Powers Song 'Work It Out' Was An Absolute Disaster

7 Seth Green

Green's role as Scott Evil, Dr. Evil's son, raised his profile and earned him critical reward. A 12 months after Goldmember was once released, Green seemed in the film The Italian Job. He is most famed for his role as Chris Griffin on the FOX animated series Family Guy. Green also created and labored on the animated series Robot Chicken in Adult Swim. Green did the voice of Howard the Duck in a number of Marvel Cinematic Universe films and sequence. These incorporated Guardians of the Galaxy and Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2. Green also voiced Leonardo in the animated sequence Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles on Nickelodeon.

6 Mindy Sterling

Sterling starred in the internet series Con Man, the place she won a Primetime Emmy Award nomination. She also had a habitual function as Miss Francine Briggs on the Nickelodeon sequence iCarly. Other habitual characters come with Principal Susan Skidmore on Disney Channel's A.N.T. Farm, and Linda Schwartz on ABC's The Goldbergs. Like Green, Sterling has done voiceover work. She provided the voice of Ms. Endive in the series Chowder for Cartoon Network. She also voiced Lin Beifong in Nickelodeon's The Legend of Korra. Another character Sterling voiced was once Morgana in the Nickelodeon version of Winx Club.

Related: Why Beyonce's Role In Austin Powers In Goldmember Was Absolutely Vital To Her Success

5 Elizabeth Hurley

Hurley's role as Vanessa Kensington in the first Austin Powers film is one in all her ideally suited identified characters. After her function in Austin Powers, Hurley starred as the Devil in the film Bedazzled. Hurley additionally made several television appearances. She appeared in The Royals on the E! Channel. The collection ran from 2015 to 2018. She additionally performed the role of Morgan le Fay in the 2019 Marvel movie Runaways. The movie is in accordance with the Marvel Comics series of the identical identify. The cosmetics company EstÃ©e Lauder has featured Hurley as a representative and model for their merchandise since 1995. Hurley additionally owns her personal beachwear line.

4 Michael York

Michael York's position as Basil Exposition was once a significant a part of the Austin Powers collection. Following his time in the series, York gave the impression in The Simpsons, taking part in the position of Mason Fairbanks, Homer Simpson's conceivable father. He additionally played the character Bernard Fremont in an episode of Law & Order: Criminal Intent. The personality used to be inspired by means of the real life serial killer Charles Sobhraj. York also gave the impression in the sequence Curb Your Enthusiasm for several episodes, where he performed a fictionalized version of himself. He additionally did voiceover work, enjoying a job in 2009's Star Wars: The Clone Wars.

3 BeyonceÌ

BeyonceÌ performed the position of Foxxy Cleopatra in Goldmember, which was once released proper before the release of her solo profession. She in the past rose to luck as a member of the staff Destiny's Child. In 2003, she launched her debut solo album which featured the hit single "Crazy In Love." BeyonceÌ's solo success would most effective grow even higher. Her 2008 album "I Am... Sasha Fierce" featured the hit singles "Single Ladies," "If I Were a Boy," and "Halo." BeyonceÌ is one among the best-selling artists of all time and has received numerous awards. Her good fortune has earned her the nickname Queen Bey.

Related: The Truth About Filming 'Austin Powers: International Man Of Mystery'

2 Heather Graham

Graham gave the impression in the second Austin Powers installment, The Spy Who Shagged Me, playing the role of Felicity Shagwell. She additionally co-starred in the film Bowfinger, reverse Steve Martin and Eddie Murphy, where she performed the role of Daisy. Graham's first starring function in a movie came with the 2000 film Committed. She persisted to have main roles in films corresponding to Say It Isn't So and From Hell. Graham also had supporting roles in the films Mary, At Any Price, Horns, and all three installments of The Hangover film series. Graham additionally had tv roles in sequence reminiscent of Scrubs and Californication.

1 Michael Caine

Michael Caine was already a movie legend when he played the function of Austin Power's father, Nigel Powers, in Goldmember. The actor endured to behave after the unlock of the film, starring with Robert Duvall, and Haley Joel Osment in the family comedy Secondhand Lions in 2003. He later gave the impression in the Batman sequels The Dark Knight and The Dark Knight Rises, playing Alfred. Caine additionally seemed in each installments of the Now You See Me movie sequence. He also starred in Christopher Nolan's film Tenet, launched in 2020.
